text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump What The Holly Fuck Is Going On At The WH Briefing? I honestly believe Trump has lost his damn mind! Why is he playing a propaganda lie riddled Campaign Ad, at The COVID-19 Briefing? Why is he talking about Biden? Biden ain’t in Government! Oh, I forgot! This is unfocused Trump!
